properties.name: Huri bauxite deposit, Ajab Shir County, East Azerbaijan Province, Iran
properties.description:
Huri bauxite deposit, Ajab Shir County, East Azerbaijan Province, Iran

Type: 56

Location: Iran

Bauxite horizons at Huri develop within karstic depressions and sinkholes of carbonate footwalls of the Ruteh Formation, overlain by carbonate of the Elika Formation.

View on Mindat.org

properties.name: Kolijan bauxite deposit, Mahabad County, West Azerbaijan Province, Iran
properties.description:
Kolijan bauxite deposit, Mahabad County, West Azerbaijan Province, Iran

Type: 56

Location: Iran

The bauxite deposit in the Kolijan area is present in five discrete outcrops as stratiform layers and lenses in karstic sinkholes and depressions of the middle Permian dolomitic limestones of the Ruteh Formation. They have a length of 1.4 km and a vari...

View on Mindat.org
